tool_description: Get all shows, Details about a show, Seasons, Episodes and Streams
name: Burning Series API
title: Burning Series API

api_list.name: Get All Routes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://burning-series-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burning-series-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Show Episodes
api_list.description:
- page url
- stream urls
- episode title

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://burning-series-api.p.rapidapi.com/shows/{showslug}/{seasonid}/{languageslug}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burning-series-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
